attributes.action: Give NHS workers a DECENT pay rise
attributes.additional_details: You need to give them what they deserve !!! Get them paid properly now !!! The public already have a VERY low opinion of this Government and it’s so called leader... do the right thing for once.... NOW
attributes.background: Do not insult NHS workers with a disgusting 1% pay rise !!! They have held this country together during this pandemic!!! Once again, you kick them in the teeth after everything they have done and more... you should be ashamed

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
